mdRecord.dcterms:title: Sir Orl. Bridgman's Conveyances: being select precedents of deeds and instruments concerning the most considerable estates in England / Drawn and approved by that honourable person in the time of his practice
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bridgeman, Orlando Sir, 1608-1674
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed by E. and R. Nutt, and R. Gosling (assigns of E. Sayer, esq;) for R. Gosling [etc.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: On t.-p. of v. 2: To which are added, many modern precedents, drawn and perused by an eminent and learned hand. With a large table, and every particular covenant noted in the margin to which it refers.
"To the reader", v. 1, signed: Tho. Page Johnson;"The preface to the reader", v. 2, signed: N.E.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Conveyancing--Great Britain
Forms (Law)--Great Britain
